task.title: Transferring Data Record between DS and T24

taskbody.prereq: This page describes required setup to perform ‘Send to t24’ or ‘Get from t24’ via DS:

step.cmd: Check that the VOC entry DIM.SIGN.ON has valid user sign on information:
Get the VOC entry DIM.TEMP (path of DIM.TEMP directory).

Go to that directory DATA inside DIM.TEMP on your T24 installation to find data records temporally copied by RTC or DS during ‘get from t24’ or ‘send to t24’ before reaching target file or tool. The folder DIM.TEMP is present inside ‘bnk’ directory.

example.p: Transfer of record F.PGM.FILE!EB.DEV.HELPER.d from DS:
